overview: The 15 minute horror/thriller "Dr. Drayce" deals with the ill-fated relationship between the mad scientist Dr. Drayce and his greatest creation: his daughter, whom he created using the DNA of his deceased wife. When Dr. Drayce realizes that his daughter is misusing his scientific legacy to enrich herself through carrying out contract murders, he decides to destroy all that he possesses. He sends his last creation into a bloody struggle against the crew of elite killers: a struggle that has a deadly outcome for all involved.
title: Dr. Drayce
